name: Alone In The Evil Space Base
name_original: Alone In The Evil Space Base
description:
Alone In The Evil Space Base is a third person action horror set in a dark space base.

Story

The story of the game is about a space patrol that finds a mysterious base on a remote planet and goes there to inspect. But this space base has a big secret and terrible events have happened in it.

Game Features

  1. Intense  action horror gameplay
  2. Beautiful  and atmospheric sci-fi environment 
  3. Entertaining and simple story
  4. Good graphics with small game size
